channel.title: Domain Help
channel.description:
Hey,
I just registered a domain, and I need help with the following things:
1. How do I make my domain name the Server IP?
2. How is it possible to make my server 24/7 without leaving my computer on, can I do this through FTP?
NOTE: If you are going to answer these questions, I would like an experienced person, not just spam.
Thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: February 03, 2007, 07:44:55 PM[/size][hr]can any1 help??[br][size=1]Posted on: February 03, 2007, 07:56:12 PM[/size][hr]can somebody please help???[br][size=1]Posted on: February 03, 2007, 09:17:44 PM[/size][hr]OMFG HELP ME PLZ!!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Domain Help

item.description:

Hey,
